tool_description: Configures budget parameters including allocation rules, savings targets, emergency fund goals, and automated distribution settings for comprehensive budget management.

budget_id.description: Unique identifier for the budget to configure

savings_rate.description: Target savings rate as percentage of income (0-50)

emergency_fund_months.description: Target emergency fund in months of expenses (1-12)

allocation_method.description: Budget allocation method: percentage, priority_based, or envelope

auto_adjust.description: Whether to automatically adjust allocations based on income changes

rollover_unused.description: Whether to rollover unused category funds to next period

alert_threshold.description: Alert when category spending exceeds this percentage (50-100)

error_messages: Budget not found: The specified budget_id does not exist.
Invalid savings rate: Savings rate must be between 0 and 50.
Invalid emergency fund months: Must be an integer between 1 and 12.
Invalid allocation method: Use one of [percentage, priority_based, envelope].
Invalid alert threshold: Must be between 50 and 100.
Invalid budget rules: Rules must be an array of strings with max 10 items.
usage: Provide budget_id and optionally configure savings_rate, emergency_fund_months, allocation_method, and other parameters. The tool applies configuration settings to the specified budget.

applied_settings.description: List of configuration settings that were applied
